Description: Floor sherd of North Ionian Late Wild Goat (black-figured) pottery stemmed plate; cream slip; exterior: three stripes painted on lower wall; interior: in tondo, star of lozenges and buds; around it, animal frieze: goose facing right between two antithetic lions (only hindquarters preserved); dividing band of dilute, red and white stripes; incision used for details of lions and of goose.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.796)
